title: elan
description: portfolio website for a berlin-based event agency. this site was originally built using react. after learning about cube css, i took the chance to rebuild the site while drastically reducing the technology.

title: martinslieder
description: a little companion to help you sing along during the martin's parade. i remember last year holding a piece of paper and using my phone as a torch. this year i decided to make a super simple website.

title: zwei
description: say hello to number two! of course i had to follow the tradition. it was also fun to see how i had evolved since the last welcome page. this one took much less time to build and i also started to simplify the technologies involved.

title: momo
description: welcome page for my son's birthday. i wanted to be able to send a digital postcard to announce the birth of our first child. and also take advantage of being able to prepare as much as possible in advance.

title: game of life
description: arcade game using conway's 'game of life' in various places throughout the experience. it was the first of three projects during my web dev bootcamp and i was absolutely blown away by what could be created out of nothing using just a computer and some basic web technologies.
